countries.name: United States
countries.description: Learn English in USA, the home of the English language. From Manchester to London, Bournemouth to Oxford, there are so many fascinating places to study. We've been enrolling students in English courses in England since 1965, so you can count on us for the trip of a lifetime. Learn more about our language programs today!
countries.title: Learn English in the UK
